alfredsnippet.snippet:
"It is no surprise to skeptics that the general public has a poor understanding of science. It may be more of a surprise that while skeptics have a better understanding of science, it is frequently a na√Øve and idealized version of science. One which few scientists even hold."

- Michael D. Sofka, Myths of Skepticism
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Are Skeptics Naive?
